europeana:record.dc:title: Stapfia 31 (1994)
europeana:record.dc:creator: Aálek M., Augustyn Danuta, Banasová Viera, Berthold Peter, Chovanec Andreas, Einarsson Arni, Feranec Jan, Finlayson C. Max, Hekera Petr, Herzig Alois, Husák Stepan, Janauer Georg A., Jarolímek Ivan, Koutníková Jana, Krahulec Frantisek, Kvst J., Leisler Bernd, Lewkowicz Stanislaw, Lindsay Richard, Lukavsky Jaromir, Martiako J., Moser M., Musil P., Otahel Jan, Otahelová Helena, Pechar Libor, Pellantová Jitka, Peterson Spencer A., Pokorny Jan, Ross Sarah, Rulík Martin, Rulíková Karla, Schiemer Fritz, Schlott Günther, Schlott Karin, Smart Michael, Szumiec Maria Anna, Uvira Vladimir, Van der Putten W.H., Winkler Hans, Zakharov Vladimir M., Zaliberová Maria
europeana:record.dc:description: Inhaltsverzeichnis: M. Moser: Foreword 1. Michael Smart: The Significance of Monitoring for the Ramsar Convention 3- 8. J. Kvst: Conclusion of the Workshop Based on Summaries Prepared by Leaders of the Working Groups 9- 12. Alois Herzig, Jan Pokorny: Conclusion of Working Group 1: Monitoring Lakes and Ponds 13- 15. Alois Herzig: Monitoring of Lake Ecosystems 17- 28. Hans Winkler, Peter Berthold, Bernd Leisler: Monitoring of Bird Populations in the Lake Neusiedl Area 29- 36. Jan Pokorny, Günther Schlott, Karin Schlott, Libor Pechar, Jana Koutníková: Monitoring of Changes in Fishpond Ecosystems 37- 45. Danuta Augustyn, Stanislaw Lewkowicz, Maria Anna Szumiec: Impact of Riverine Water Quality on Fish Pond Ecosystems 47- 53. P. Musil, M. Aálek: Changes in Abundance of Waterbirds in South Bohemia during the Last Decade: A Summary Review 55- 60. W.H. Van der Putten: Assessing Ecological Change in European Wetlands: How to Know what Parameters Should be Monitored to Evaluate the Die-Back of Common Reed (Phragmites australis)? 61- 68. Richard Lindsay: Conclusion of Working Group 2: Monitoring Mires/Peatlands 69- 72. Richard Lindsay, Sarah Ross: Monitoring of Peat Bog Systems 73- 92. Fritz Schiemer, Georg A. Janauer: Conclusion of Working Group 3: Monitoring Rivers and Floodplains 93- 94. Fritz Schiemer: Monitoring of Floodplains: Limnological Indicators 95- 107. Georg A. Janauer: Monitoring Aspects of Interdisciplinary Studies on the River Danube 109- 112. Martin Rulík, Karla Rulíková, Petr Hekera, Vladimir Uvira: Physico-Chemical Conditions and Aquatic Macrophytes in Floodplain Pools of the Morava River 113- 119. Helena Otahelová, Viera Banasová, Ivan Jarolímek, Maria Zaliberová, Jan Otahel, Jan Feranec, Stepan Husák: Vegetation and Ecological Conditions in the Floodplain of the Morava River (Slovakia) 121- 127. Jitka Pellantová, J. Martiako: Population Trends in Waterbird Species in the Alluvial Area of the Dyje-river, Czech Republic 129- 135. Andreas Chovanec: Water Quality Monitoring in Austria 137- 150. Jaromir Lukavsky: Miniaturized Algal Growth Bioassay 151- 156. C. Max Finlayson: Conclusion of Working Group 4: Ecological Change + Concept & Application: Defining Gaps and Priorities 157- 161. C. Max Finlayson: Monitoring Ecological Change in Wetlands 163- 180. Spencer A. Peterson: The Environmental Monitoring and Assessment Program (EMAP): its Objectives, Approach, and Status Relative to Wetlands 181- 195. Stepan Husák, Frantisek Krahulec: Monitoring Successional and Other Changes in Wetland Plant Communities 197- 209. Arni Einarsson: Myvatn-Laxá Ramsar Site + a Case of Integrated Monitoring 211- 219. Vladimir M. Zakharov: Biotest as an Integrated Technique for Monitoring Ecological Changes in Different Wetland Types 221
